headline.print_headline: Layoffs Take Heavier Toll Near Retirement Age
headline.main: At Risk: Layoffs Take Heavier Toll Near Retirement Age

docs.lead_paragraph: People who lost their jobs after age 50 had twice the risk of stroke and heart attack as people their age who were still working, a new study suggests.
docs.snippet: People who lost their jobs after age 50 had twice the risk of stroke and heart attack as people their age who were still working, a new study suggests.
